title: Pfupi Nhoroondo yeArt in Space - Orbital Tembere
heading: Nhoroondo Pfupi yeArt in Space
intro: Kubva pakatanga kubudirira kwekutanga satellite yekugadzira muna 1957 , anopfuura zviuru gumi zvemasatellite akauya kuzotenderera Pasi. Munguva ino nyowani, maartist akawana nzira yekuwedzera maitiro avo uye nzvimbo yekunze yave rudzi rutsva rwe canvas. Nezvo, mibvunzo yakakosha pamusoro pezvematongerwo enyika yekuongorora nzvimbo yamuka - kunyangwe zvimwe zvakawanda zvisati zvavharwa.

leonov.text: Mufananidzo wekutanga wakagadzirwa muchadenga waive mufananidzo wekubuda kwezuva pamusoro pePasi, wakagadzirwa nemuchadenga wekuRussia Alexei Leonov ari muchikepe cheVoskhod 2 muna 1965 .
leonov.caption: Chikamu chekutanga cheunyanzvi chakasikwa munzvimbo, uye mapenzura Alexei Leonov akashandisa kudhirowa. Mufananidzo: Museum yeYuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Makore matatu gare gare, Moon Museum , imwe miniscule ceramic plate inonzi yakamhara paMwedzi ine zvinyorwa nevatanhatu vevanyori vane mukurumbira muUS panguva iyoyo: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers naAndy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Mufananidzo weMwedzi Museum kubva kuchinyorwa chekutanga cheNew York Times. Chigunwe chinovhara mufananidzo waWarhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Mupiro wekutsamwisa waWarhol - kumusoro kuruboshwe - wakaita kuti chirongwa ichi chiomese vezvenhau panguva iyoyo.
moonMuseum.caption2: Mufananidzo uyo New York Times yakasarudza kuburitsa, nemifananidzo inoonekwa pazasi uye kudhirowa kwaAndy Warhol mukona yekuruboshwe.

fallenAstronaut.text: Muna 1971 , chivezwa chidiki chehumanoid aruminiyamu chinonzi Fallen Astronaut chakaiswa paMwedzi naApollo 15 muzivi wemuchadenga David Scott . Muimbi weBelgian Paul Van Hoeydonck aida, nechidimbu ichi, kurangarira vazivi vemuchadenga nevemuchadenga vakafa mukufambisira mberi kwekuongorora muchadenga.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Maonero eChirangaridzo plaque yakasara pamwedzi panzvimbo yekumhara yeHadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Mumakore ekuma1970 , ese ari maviri maPioneer Plaques neVoyager Probes akaisa mahorizoni matsva ehunyanzvi hwemuchadenga. Vakatakura goridhe-anodized aruminiyamu plaques ane mameseji anooneka kubva kuPasi kuenda kune chero vamwe vanofamba muchadenga vangazviwana mune ramangwana riri kure, vairatidza hupenyu hwevanhu muzvinhu zvahwo zvakakosha.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 uye 11 plaques, akatakurwa munzvimbo yakadzika muma1970.

dove.text: Muna 1990 , Brazil yakasiya mucherechedzo wayo pandima iyi neDOVE /OSCAR-17 , ine njere dzeamateur setiraiti yesimba guru rekudetemba. Kunyangwe musiki wayo aisazviona semuimbi, chaive chidetembo chakadzama: chakarekodha manzwi evana vachikumbira runyararo uye ndokuapa kune vanopfuura zviuru zviviri vaanoshanda neredhiyo pasi rese, achishandura CubeSat inopayona kuita basa rekurira pamwe chete.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, satiraiti yenhetembo yekuBrazil inotumira mazwi evana erunyararo, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Muna 2012 , muimbi Trevor Paglen akatanga "The Last Pictures" , diki-etched disc rine 100 mapikicha akanamatira Echostar XVI communications satellite in geostationary orbit. Yakagadzirwa kuti igare mabhiriyoni emakore, inoitirwa kukurira budiriro yemunhu sechinhu chekuchera matongo chenguva iri kure.
lastPictures.caption: Iyo Yekupedzisira Mifananidzo, diki-etched disc rakagadzirirwa kukurira vanhu, rakavambwa muna 2012.

ulises.text: Muna 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) yakatanga Ulises I , nanosatellite yakabatwa semutambo wepfungwa pasi pekutungamirirwa kwemuimbi Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Iyo satellite yakatakurwa kuenda ku stratosphere pabharumu panguva yeFeria del Libro de Guadalajara. Yakagadzirirwa kuputika kweanenge maawa mana uye ichidzika neparachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, pfungwa setiraiti opera naColectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Yakanga isiri kusvika 2014 apo yekutanga satellite yehunyanzvi yakatangwa. Yunivhesiti yeTokyo's ARTSAT-1 Invader chirongwa chakatumira data repanyika kuPasi iro raishandiswa mukumisikidzwa kwehunyanzvi uye kugadzira mimhanzi.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader chimiro uye zvikamu zvakasara zvakasara paPasi.
artsat.caption2: mishoni [SPACE x ART] - kupfuura Cosmologies kuratidzwa kwakaitirwa kuMuseum yeContemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Brazilian and American contemporary artist Eduardo Kac akabatsira muspace art kuburikidza nekushanda pamwe neNASA uye SpaceX . Yake "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), yakagadzirwa neFrench astronaut Thomas Pesquet , yakakonzera chivezwa chakagadzirwa muInternational Space Station .
kac.caption: Inner Telescope paInternational Space Station, yakagadzirwa neFrench astronaut Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Muna 2018 , a passive CubeSat yakavakwa sepurojekiti yehunyanzvi yakatangwa mukutenderera. Yakagadzirwa ne bahamian conceptual artist Tavares Strachan , Enoki ane 24-karat-goridhe canopic chirongo chine bhasikoro rekutanga African-American astronaut, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (chikamu chekuratidzira), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, mufananidzo ⓒ Museum Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Mugore rimwe chetero, Trevor Paglen's Orbital Reflector yakatangwa zvakare sechivezwa chinogara muCubeSat isingashande. Basa racho rakanga riri chiito chounyanzvi chaiitirwa kuchinja nzira yatinoona nayo nzvimbo yedu munyika. Yakanga isina kuiswa zvakanaka. Kunyange zvazvo isina kumbovhurwa semagadzirirwo akaitwa, yakamutsa nhaurirano dzakakosha uye yakatora mhinduro dzerudo kubva kune vanoongorora nyeredzi, vesainzi, vezvenhau, vadzidzisi, vadzidzi, uye veruzhinji pasi rese, zvichiratidza kuti hunyanzvi hwekuita hunyanzvi hahufanire kubudirira.
orbitalReflector.caption: Digital Rendering yeOrbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Mamwe maartist mazhinji akabatsira kumunda weunyanzvi hwemuchadenga, mumwe nemumwe achiunza maonero akasiyana mukutsvaga kwavo. Mapurojekiti anozivikanwa anosanganisira Sarah Jane Pell's astronaut artist tsvakiridzo inoongorora maitiro evanhu munzvimbo dzakanyanyisa; Agnes Meyer-Brandis's Moon Goose Analogue project inoongorora nhoroondo dzezvakaitika kare uye dzemazuva ano dzekuongorora nzvimbo; Chirongwa cheNahum's AstroArts chinofambisa hunyanzvi hwekuedza microgravity; uye Arthur Woods's Cosmic Dancer chivezwa, chivezwa chekutanga chakaratidzwa muchadenga chiri muchiteshi cheMir muna 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Muna 2025 , mushure memakore mana ekutsvagisa nekusimudzira, muimbi weBrazil Edson Pavoni uye boka revashandi vemarudzi akawanda vachaparura Orbital Temple , satellite inobatanidzwa inokoka chero munhu ari munyika kuti atumire mazita ku orbit, achigadzira chiyeuchidzo chakanyanya kubatanidza kunze kwemiganhu.
orbitalTemple.caption: Temberi yeOrbital paMercosul Bienal. Mufananidzo: Clara Marques

imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Mwedzi Museum Ceramic wafer inoratidza zvese zvemifananidzo
